website_summaries.verdict: A unique tent that attaches to your vehicle to give you maximum storage space.
pros: Wraps around the cargo area of your SUV for extra storage area
Plenty of room for 5 plus gear
High ceiling makes it easy for adults to stand
cons: High price point compared to other tents in this size range

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: For a first time camper who doesn't want to spend a lot of money this is a great way to start the adventure. I am a senior camper and found that the tent was easy for me to set up and take down without help. I had no trouble attaching it to my SUV and when it was all set up, it was very roomy. Glad I bought this. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ktaylor

customer_reviews.title: four stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Really roomy. One important thing I didn't realize when I bought it was that almost all campgrounds are configured with the living area on the passenger side of the vehicle parking place (if you back it in). This means that with the tent attached to the vehicle the opening is toward the back & the screen room facing the campground next to you. Most places won't allow you to park the vehicle off the designated parking place which are not usually long enough to accommodate the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: but it was fairly easy to set up and had a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use the tent once this year, but it was fairly easy to set up and had a lot of room. It was poring rain the second night, and not a drop of water got into the tent. Access to the car made it really convenient, and it was easy to attach and detach when I needed to drive somewhere. It was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ciscolaughs

customer_reviews.title: Totally worthwhile purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! We are camping in style now! The tent is built to last, this is an investment that should last for YEARS. It is roomy, comfortable, fairly easy to set up (There are a lot of elements to it, but that is unavoidable for a tent this size) and works great. We got a lot of attention while camping out of it. People thought it was the coolest thing. I have ours attached to the end of our truck with a camper shell on it, and we sleep in the bed. Much better than sleeping on the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Tomakze

customer_reviews.title: When poorly seen strap pops off the plastic hook might hit you from the elastic snapping loose.
customer_reviews.text: Ok to put up. Nice and tall and large. Most of the straps broke during our trial set up!!!! One little piece of thread. Now can’t hook to car and have to sew it and seal it. Will add to review how it is for camping. They keeps sending emails asking about it and no one responds. 3 more straps popped off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Wise

customer_reviews.title: We love this tent! Perfect for our truck and shell topper.
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent! Using with a Tacoma short bed w/ shell top opened into the tent. Fits our vehicle really well and the setup is surprisingly easy. First time took 15 minutes, now takes us probably 5. Everything seems very high quality and we appreciate how easy setup and takedown can be. Adding rain fly by yourself could be difficult, but doable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob K.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great on Rubicon with lift!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! We have got it for our Jeep Rubicon (has 4 inch lift) and it works great! Lots of room! One person wa sable to set it up and take it down in a very short time! Also when taking it down, it fit perfectly back in the carrying bag. Would definetly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boondocks

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small SUV to extend a tent from
customer_reviews.text: That way you can include the space of your SUV tail gate and storage area for additional room, such as a place for the kids to sleep. Goes up fast once you do it once, following the instructions. There was a flaw on one flap on receipt we discovered while camping. Took a picture, sent it to manufacturer (not seller) and they immediately replaced the entire shell! Can't ask for better customer service, warranty without hassle, and it will last now for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. We used for our camping trip. We have a town and country minivan. The concept was great but it leaked like crazy! I was literally soaking up water all weekend. There wasn’t a dry spot to be found. This would be a great option if you live in a very dry climate. We returned it. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bada** tent. Love it!! Fit great on my 2014 Hyundai Tucson. Lots of room for a coleman queen size mattress and my dog's matress. Being able to keep the luggage in the car is the reason why there is so much room. Screen room was great for the fiance, dog and I to keep away from the bugs. Awning area was nice too for when it got too hot in the screen room :-P That was mostly due to us not thinking our setup over 100% haha. I definitely recommend this if you're on the fence! Just do it, click buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Took this tent camping to the Davy Crockett National Forest. Set up was easy, but we have been tent camping for many years. The tent was easy to attach to the back of the CRV. Look forward to many more camping trips with this tent.
customer_reviews.author: j m wood

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is glamping at it's finest. I took this tent to Pacific Northwest 5 times now, where the weather is all sorts of rain, wind, and hot sun. We sleep in the car hatch on a 6inch memory foam mattress, so the space inside the tent is luxurious. We stay dry, cool, and comfy. It takes 2 peeps to stand it up initially, but the rest is easy to tack up. The instructions are waterproof tags lining the stuff sack. The stuff sack is easy to use with the tent only. I use another tote for the rainfly. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great SUV Tent
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, easy set up and looks great. It fit well with our Chevy Tahoe. Camped in cool rainy weather, the tent kept us warn and dry.!! No leaks!!!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent and worked great on our Honda Pilot
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent and worked great on our Honda Pilot. Spacious enough for two queen beds and maybe a twin if you want to squeeze more in. Easy to put up and take down and pretty sturdy so far (used it 4 times so far).
customer_reviews.author: Jeinny

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this tent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tent!!!! We have a runaway camper and this fits perfect to the back, I can stand up in it and I use the side room as a changing room. Fits our needs perfectly. It's well build and easy to put together, took me about 15 minutes by myself. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Iris V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up despite it's size...
customer_reviews.text: We have used this tent now two times since initial purchase. I have no regrets in my purchase. We hardly use the the option that allows one to sleep in the cab of the SUV (an Xterra) but still fun to marvel at. This last time camping, it took husband and I 20 min to set up and about that long to take down.
customer_reviews.author: RVA mom

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, made to last
customer_reviews.text: Took a little bit to assemble the first time because it goes up in a different manner than other tents but it was sturdy and secure in high winds and comfortable with plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pultorak

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TENT!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for me and my kids for camping. The material is very durable and it was relatively easy to set up once you know where the front and back are. I set it up the first time in my driveway by myself and it went up without issues. Out at the campsite it took two of us and was a quick and easy. I attached it to a Grande Cherokee and it worked great. If your concerned about bugs coming in around where it secures to the rear of the SUV you can push towels around it. On my vehicle it wasn’t a problem so there wasn’t a need. I’d highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: MeT

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Use it as an addition to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Use it as an addition to my Little Guy Tag-Max Teardrop trailer. Also tried it out on my 2015 Ford Explorer SUV and it works well on it. Take your time putting it together - don't rush it. Once you figure it it goes up quick.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect suv tent
customer_reviews.text: Have used now 3 times and it just gets easier and better. Fits our 2017 Edge perfectly. Sturdy construction...easy set up...takes about 30 min. It stands alone also.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tent! I was looking for something that would be easy to transport and set up. This was perfect for my trip! I was able to set it up myself, I'm a 36 yr old female. It did sprinkle a bit one night but I had the rain fly on and had no issues. I have a Ford Escape and it was quite easy to get set up and having the extra room in the tent was so nice. I can't wait until my next trip. I did do a practice set up before my trip which took me about 30 min but then I had everything up in less than 10 minutes on site.
customer_reviews.author: ~Jac~

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is just what we were looking for. We have set it up but have not slept in it yet. One thing though, we have a gmc 2500 HD long bed truck. The straps that go over the top and attach to the hood are not long enough. We fixed it by using two short bungee cords. We first bought the less expensive truck tent but ended up selling it because there are no solid window flaps. This one, all windows have closing flaps for added privacy and warmth. Appears to be well made and it was very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky2run

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tent with little to no problems
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome. I can put it together in under 20 minutes by myself. But I had some problems, as soon as I finished setting it up I noticed a few problems. On the side where the door with awning right below the door is a tear where it connects to the bottom. Also one of the clips for the rainfly to clip into was broken. Besides those two things, the tent stayed dry the water stopped at the edges of the tent which surprised me. The first time I used it there was also a 90mph thunderstorm and it withstood it (luckily). I love this tent
customer_reviews.author: Brendan C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Wow we loved this! Not a single person setup if you want to keep your sanity however. We felt like we had our own little tent house and it was so cozy. Didn’t experience any rain but it kept the wind down which was nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camping fun
customer_reviews.text: I like this tent alot because it is really big, anyone can stand strait up in it. During the day i can just slide the mattress from the back of the car into the tent so i can drive somewhere else and not have to take the tent down entirely. The screen room is nice to keep away from bugs or put things in i don,t want to get wet but not in tent or car. Easy to put up. I can do it by myself easy. Taking on and off car is easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tent. The two of us can set it up in 15-20 minutes and none of it is difficult. The inside is plenty roomy for the two of us plus a queen sized air mattress. It fit our Dodge Grand Caravan with no problems at all. I see us getting a lot us use from this. Glad we chose this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. Attached easily to my Subaru Outback. It is roomy, easy to put up by myself and tall so that I can stand in each area comfortably. Know that it is very big and thus heavy at ~50 lbs. I would recommend this to any car camper.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My husband set it up and says it was really quick and easy once he figured it out. It hooked up perfectly to our Rav4. We made it through a heavy rainstorm and everything stayed dry. It is almost impossible to repack it into the bag that it comes with- I purchased another blue duffel bag and split the tent between 2 bags for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Katron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent and I love the convenience of attaching/detaching my suv. It took awhile to set it up the first time but after that I have it up by myself in 15 minutes. Roomy and exceeds expectations. I do wish the extra room had a floor included with the tent but I knew it was included when I purchased it. A ground tarp works fine. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gunslinger 44-40

customer_reviews.title: Great, but make sure you have help
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated, but is heavy and cumbersome. If you're not in a hurry and have help to set it up, particularly putting the rain fly on, its good. Durable material, zippers are strong. The awning is a bit chintzy. If you aren't attaching it to your SUV these is a lot of flapping extra material to catch rain and leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B.

customer_reviews.title: Wind, Hail and Rain in Colorado- Dodge Grand Caravan
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a two week stay in Colorado at an elevation of 10,000 ft. I was very impressed with the tent. It withstood 30mph winds, pea sized hail and torrential rains. I slept in the back of my Dodge Grand Caravan and used the tent to store my fishing gear and float tube. There was plenty of room for an anti-gravity chair, a 6 foot table for me to relax while the afternoon storms passed through. I highly recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works well on full size pickup with topper
customer_reviews.text: Works well on our full size truck, stayed completely dry even in a downpour. The canopy is a bit challenging to make workable as the support to keep it up and structurally stable is not effective. Overall, we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Nora C.

customer_reviews.title: Great family Jeep tent
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and portable. Expected more durability for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent. We are an avid outdoor family of ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tent. We are an avid outdoor family of 4 and this is absolutely perfect, and an amazing price! We hook it onto our Honda Element.
customer_reviews.author: devaun ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Absolutely love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely L♥️VE this tent!!! Easy to set up and take down. Enough room to stand up!!! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dirosario

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for van life
customer_reviews.text: Love it fits our Chevy Tahoe great and I set up alone only took me a hour took my wife 35 mins to out it away so not bad !!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Tent is great, but houses are better, and how in the world could you fit 10 people in here
customer_reviews.text: The tent was easy and fun to set up with the kids. Was warm then poured down and windy the first night out. All stayed warm and dry. Very flexible for setup configurations. Attached easily to a full sized pickup and would work well with most any vehicle. Well packaged and thought out. Great tent for camping out of a pickup or suv. Retains heat well. Sleeps 5 comfortably. A review from a non-camper. If your looking for a truck tent, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: D or G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design! We are looking forward to using it ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2005 Dodge Ram 1500 with a tall topper and the truck has a small lift kit. This tent fits it perfectly! Excellent design! We are looking forward to using it soon!
customer_reviews.author: L J K

customer_reviews.title: Great product, so-so quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall very satisfied and would buy again. One problem seems to be quality of the netting, it tears pretty easily and I’m pretty sure it was torn when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great structure, design could use some improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious tent with quality materials. Only challenge was the portion that wraps around the truck is not waterproof, and the rain fly doesn’t extend over this portion of the tent. Each morning after there was rain we had Water pooling in the fabric. Hoping they look into this, as the rest of the tent worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. P. Gianunzio

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of being able to sleep up in the bed of the truck. Very easy to assemble. 3 stars is because the first time we used it, it rained twice and both times we had to move all our stuff into the truck because water dripped in at the seams. Tent is not made well. Expected better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: adeibler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. It takes 2 people to put it together. First time took me about 30-45 minutes but second time took less.
customer_reviews.author: Nattanan

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent. Even not connected to a vehicle, it is a great tent. Better have lots of room at your site though. The ability to not have to unload your entire vehicle is spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Greymyst

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. I am unable to set it up by myself which was why I purchased it. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great for pods
customer_reviews.text: After three tries with three other tents, this one is a perfect setup for a pod
customer_reviews.author: WHW

customer_reviews.title: Held together through a major thunderstorm
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve fit nicely over my Mercedes Metris, although I couldn't open both rear doors into the tent. I could open one door all the way, and the other about halfway. It didn't matter - it still worked very well. There were no leaks and it held together beautifully through a severe thunderstorm with high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl G. Hohle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and roomy inside
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 20 min to unpack and put up the first time by myself. The second time it took less than 5. Snaps right on to my pathfinder. Nice and tall, my 6'4" husband doesn't have to hunch over while inside. Large enough inside for a queen blow up mattress and two dog beds.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect. Easy to set up and attach to suv. Plenty of room and the screen room is great for an entryway to keep the dirt out of the main tent. Also good for storing your camping equipment out of the rain. It is a large tent and heavy to carry but it is very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Sleeping & Storage options. A Winner.
customer_reviews.text: Great Large Tent: Not as quickly set up as ratings indicate, but great tent for person with van or suv who may like “off ground” option. Vehicle, main tent area, screened area(no floor) offer space and storage for small family. Took me more than hour first time. Imagine 30mins next time.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D.

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: A little cumbersome to put up unless you have 2-3 people. Very roomy inside and well protected from rain.
customer_reviews.author: KaelaG

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line the tent is a bad design
customer_reviews.text: The idea of the tent is great, but it just doesn’t deliver. mice can get in where The tent connects to your SUV and rain also comes in as well so I’m gonna return this product because it was expensive and didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy a falbo

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Camping. Rained, tent had 2 inches of water in floor., I measured. Happened 2 days in a row. First, last time I use this tent. Had lot less expensive ones that did not do this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Thacker

customer_reviews.title: they stand behind their product
customer_reviews.text: there was a slight flaw in the tent production - they stood behind it and completely replaced the tent shell - we used the tent traveling west and it worked perfectly for our purposes
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Lautz

customer_reviews.title: Set it up, back up and attach
customer_reviews.text: It is a great addition to the back of a minivan or SUV. It is a tall unit and I am not, so it requires a lot of streatching for me. If only it could spring up on its own! It really has lots of room for everything, so if you drive off during the day, all you have to do is zip up the panel that attaches to your vehicle, and leave your camping equipment behind.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Samson

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup comfortable camping
customer_reviews.text: This tent is wonderful! It was easy to setup! Looks like many camping trips to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Poeckert

customer_reviews.title: This tent is AWESOME! It works on almost any car or SUV
customer_reviews.text: This tent is AWESOME! It works on almost any car or SUV. I use it on a Subaru outback and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Tent is great quality and was easy to set up. 4 fiberglass poles to the top, 4 steel poles to the ground, another fiberglass pole and 2 steel poles for the screen room, put on the rain fly, 2 more steel poles for the awning....about 20-35 mins. Tent is very tall and durable...would buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: pastadutchie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This tent hooks up to your SUV and can stand alone. Easy to put up. I did it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Soto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for Hamm radio field days and emergency response teams!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and fast delivery. Look forward to next time
customer_reviews.author: John A. Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Super Spacious & Easy Setup!
customer_reviews.text: Super quick and easy to put up! Lots of room and connected to my jeep very well! Got a lot of complements fro this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $'s.
customer_reviews.text: We have used it twice and it makes my wife happy. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Rexrung

customer_reviews.title: Indoor use only
customer_reviews.text: The top ripped open with the wind on the first night. I threw it trash and stayed at a hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great. I sleep in the truck and the 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: i"ve used about 16 times now. Great. I sleep in the truck and the 3 dogs sleep in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable tent, easy to assemble, lots of room, good ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions on video or written.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that encourages people to want to go camping. The transaction for this product was completely positive. David Tribolet.
customer_reviews.author: David Tribolet

customer_reviews.title: They liked
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son and his family. They liked it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set this up easily and it fit my 2003 RAV4
customer_reviews.text: Set this up easily and it fit my 2003 RAV4. Very well designed with nice touches. Great quality. Can be used as just a tent.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great. We love the sizes and add ons
customer_reviews.text: Great. We love the sizes and add ons. Very important that you have a flat surface to use all functions properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jess H.

customer_reviews.title: works great on a toyota tundra with cap on the back.
customer_reviews.text: We camped in Alberta for a week in Sept using this tent. Setup was easy, it fit over our truck cap perfectly and was water tight. We had two nights of bad storms with wind and rain . . . no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: We've only used it a few times but so far it seems really well made, conveniently placed doors, so easy to put up. We've tried several other tents over the past years and this one seems like it's going to be a keeper. Planning on using it a lot this year so maybe I can review it again later. The company was really great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: AboveCloud9

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well put together tent & was easily set up by one person. It is everything I expected. If you will be camping in soft ground (sand) you will need better stakes as the ones supplied aren't much
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: great tent
customer_reviews.text: Great tent but one pole broke with first use. Hopefully Napier Enterprises will back their product and replace this pole.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used this to camp in both state parks & wilderness camping. Easy setup even at night, fit the back of my Kia Sorento perfectly and loved having access to my vehicle from inside. Also was fast & easy to disconnect from to leave standing. Grteat value for the money. Well made & works just as they say. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to go actually camping
customer_reviews.text: We've put this up a few times for some backyard camping! The whole family loves it! I can't wait to go on an actual camping trip with this. Once my husband and I watched a youtube video on how to put it up, we had no problem putting it up. The only thing I recommend is having something to help hold the two poles of the canopy up. We couldn't get the cords tight enough (and with a toddler running around the poles just kept falling over). I ended up taking two small mason jars that the kids filled with rocks and sand to hold the poles up, it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: LadyPhoenyxFire

customer_reviews.title: works well with a truck cap
customer_reviews.text: Tall and roomy inside, privacy shades even for the entry area. No leaks. Kind of expensive but still great value.
customer_reviews.author: bsnake8

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: The product does everything it claims it would and everything that I expected. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: BrandanL

customer_reviews.title: Great, spacious tent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent. First setup took about 30 minutes without any problems. Lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Mataranglo

customer_reviews.title: Love the tent
customer_reviews.text: Love the tent. It was exactly what we were looking for and have used it numerous times. Great product, definitely recommend! Amazon did a stellar job on getting it shipped to us on time for a camp trip; Amazon Prime amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb

customer_reviews.title: Camper Buddy
customer_reviews.text: Was great. Have used it only once but set it up nicely. Rained that night and it kept everything dry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: loved this tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent worked perfect for our camping trip. It was easy to set up. It was awesome. It fit perfect on our 2013 ford explorer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect fit in my Silverado w/cab height canopy
customer_reviews.text: only complain is having to seam seal a brand new tent! It WILL leak if you don't. Was perfect fit in my Silverado w/cab height canopy.
customer_reviews.author: gail day

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy well build
customer_reviews.text: excellent design, heavy duty polls. good instructions, and you can fold it up and get it back into the storage bag!!
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent. Fast to set up and made very well. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Markham

customer_reviews.title: Great tent.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once while visiting Idaho but it worked flawlessly. It takes a little time to assemble because it is a big tent. We could have probably slept 8 without too much discomfort. Great tent.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to set up. Can be done by one person. Overall looks like a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: roy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy using this rent especially in areas with bears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent! Camped in it for two weeks - ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent! Camped in it for two weeks - no problems! Easy to set up and take down! Attached to our Jeep like a dream! Great product, fast shipping! Would but from again!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. Hippler

customer_reviews.title: Great set-up
customer_reviews.text: This tent was super-easy to set up and worked great. Put my son's air mattress in the back of the van and he was cozy. It poured rain the entire weekend we used it, and everything inside stayed dry!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rodger

customer_reviews.title: good product but didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: The tent is well made, good concept, good value, it just wouldn't fit up well enough to the vehicle we tried to use it with. Too many gaps where insects could still enter. Tried it once and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: It is a GREAT tent. Easy to set up (by myself) Great size. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorner Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is freaking awesome. We attached it to our 2014 Wrangler Unlimited. The parts are of sturdy, good quality and the setup was pretty easy and only took 10-15 min. There's plenty of headroom and all the storage can go in the back of the vehicle to create even more internal space. The sun room and the awning are cool extras.
customer_reviews.author: Wookie76

customer_reviews.title: leaks water at the zippers where the vehicle port is ...
customer_reviews.text: leaks water at the zippers where the vehicle port is and the vestibule zipper and if the ground isnt perfectly level the vesibule cant be set up correctly
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Way better than i thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Way better than i thought it would be .. it was over 45 mph where we camped and the tent still should all nove
customer_reviews.author: Pikachu

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent! It is easy to set up, and even though it has several sections only the main section can be set up which is nice for the light camping days. You can walk anywhere in the tent without stooping. It stays cool even in the summer heat (cool enough to camp in Texas), and dry in heavy rain. We have used the screen porch for extra sleeping with the footprint tarp for the bottom. Unfortunately, we lost our beloved tent to 81 mph winds and 3 barbwire fences...... so we are buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: jjbjrs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the thought, it seems a little complicated. Wouldn't want to be in a hurry!
customer_reviews.author: peggi

customer_reviews.title: Great room! Seems to be thoughtfully made
customer_reviews.text: Great room! Seems to be thoughtfully made. I like all the extra ways you can configure it!
customer_reviews.author: tak

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Great bit of equipment, superb quality and so easy to erect. I shall be recommending this to all my friends who have SVU's.
customer_reviews.author: Puresavage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tent. I am very happy with this product, good price, like new!
customer_reviews.author: thangy2k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it bunches!!! Works well. We stayed dry in a rain storm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Napier Family-Tents sportz SUV Tent
product_meta.description:
This innovative tent wraps around the cargo area of your vehicle, allowing total access to your vehicle for storage or an additional sleeping area. No more having to unzip and zip tent doors and open and close vehicle doors to get something you need from your vehicle.

AMAZON.COM
The Sportz SUV Tent quickly transforms your CUV, SUV, or minivan into a comfortable home away from home. No more having to unzip and zip tent doors and open and close vehicle doors to get something you need from your vehicle. The bathtub-style floor and GoBe Dry ultimate rain protection system ensure you don't get wet and the steel and fiberglass pole structures offers strength and durability. There's plenty of headroom with over 7 feet in the center and 6 feet at the corners. The vehicle sleeve is easily adjusted to ensure a custom fit to your vehicle. Other features include a full-length seam-taped rain fly with a 6 by 6 foot awning for shade, Cyclone venting system, and two skylights for superb ventilation.



The vehicle sleeve is easily adjusted to ensure a custom fit to your vehicle.  Features: 

 * Roomy 9 by 9 foot tent 
 * Sleeps 4-5 people 
 * Plenty of headroom with over 7 feet in the center and 6 feet at the corners 
 * Easily adjust the vehicle sleeve for a custom fit to your vehicle 
 * Steel and fiberglass pole structure for strength 
 * Bathtub style floor for superb waterproofing 
 * GoBe Dry ultimate rain protection system 
 * Full length, tape seamed rain fly with a 6 by 6 foot awning for shade 
 * Cyclone Venting system and 2 skylights offer superb ventilation 

 Specifications: 

 * Dimensions: 9 by 9 feet; 81 square feet 
 * Sleeps: 4 to 5 people plus 2 in cargo area 
 * Seasons: 3 
 * Poles: 4 steel, 4 fiberglass, 2 steel awning ,li>Fabric: 1200 PU polyester taffeta 
 * Weight: 30 pounds
feature_bullets: This roomy 9 by 9 foot tent sleeps 4-5 people with 7 feet of headroom in the center and 6 feet at the corners
Sleeve attach to your vehicle to convert cargo space into sleeping space
Transform the vehicle tent into a ground tent by fully removing the vehicle sleeve
Features new steel and fiberglass pole structure for one person set-up
Includes an expandable carrying bag for storage
